ðŸ“– Summary: Memvid is a video-based AI memory library that stores millions of text chunks in MP4 files, enabling lightning-fast semantic search without needing a traditional database. It offers features like built-in chat, PDF support, efficient storage, and offline-first functionality, making it suitable for creating searchable knowledge bases from various text sources.
